<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wild Winds Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=6017) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 124 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Qi Spells

</column>

---

You learn a stance that lets you attack from a distance. You gain the [_wild winds stance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2062) qi spell. Though entering the stance is a qi spell, the wind crash Strikes the stance grants are not, so you can use them as often as you like while in the stance.

<title level="2">Wild Winds Initiate leads to...</title>
[Wild Winds Gust](/Feats.aspx?ID=6038)
name: Wild Winds Initiate
